ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Well my wife and I were together well be EQ came along....: Good luck in your search. ... From: Dr Scurrilous PhD To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday,
ygData.messageBody:
Well my wife and I were together well be EQ came along....:> Good luck in your search.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Dr Scurrilous PhD
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2002 8:28 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543

atleast you have a mate to share you addiction with
I have given up trying to find a mate that does not
understand EQ
I only look for a mate that can share my addiction :p
I look everywhere, far and wide
I am on Antonius bayle, looking for a good european wife, I
will move anyplace in the world for a mate, and inhouse
network :p
so we can play together
cuddle together
be best of friends
and **censored**
in that order of importance
hmmmmm
I always said people had a problem when they put there drug
of choice before sex
hmmmmm
either I am seriously addicted or just getting old :(



--- Orion <orionv@...> wrote:
> Of course you are...:> My wife and I have our mains on
> The Trib...Mine is a level 50 Ogre Shaman hers is a level
> 51 Ogre Warrior. We have 33 characters over 5 servers so
> join the addiction club...:> Ain't it great...heheh
>
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: Dr Scurrilous PhD
>   To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>   Sent: Monday, July 29, 2002 5:54 PM
>   Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
>
>
>   I am 34 and will be playing one year in sept
>   Still do not have a character over 36
>   I still have not chose a main
>   I have 32 characters on 11 servers
>   including stormhammer
>   am I addicted???
>   maybe :p
>
>
>   --- Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote:
>   > WOOOT, I am 37 , so kids to some  of you but ancient
>   > to the teenagers......lol
>   >
>   > It is nice to see non-teens playing the game and even
>   > better to see people over 30.
>   >
>   > Keep going.........
>   >
>   >
>   >

>   > > Ah, you are just kids =)
